content: Really?! ...Ahem. {A笑眯眯}I mean, thank you so much for the invitation. I was actually about to ask if I could stay and continue my ecological observation efforts here.
info: 获得生态屋-墨尔斯-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: After that, I'll... <style=Highlight>stay here</style> at the Ecohouse and take care of <style=Highlight>settling creatures</style>. If you need anything, you know where to find me.
info: 获得生态屋-墨尔斯-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: So, about this <style=Highlight>Ecohouse Building Kit</style>... Please pick a spot for it and set it down. It'll be done by <style=Highlight>tomorrow</style>.
info: 获得生态屋-墨尔斯-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: I had this <style=Highlight>Ecohouse Building Kit</style> priority-ordered for you. You can use it to build an <style=Highlight>Ecohouse</style> that's capable of housing even more creatures.
info: 获得生态屋-墨尔斯-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: Don't worry, it only costs a mere 100,000 Dough, which is nowhere near enough for your help.{A挠头} Hmm... is there anything else I can do for you?
info: 获得生态屋-墨尔斯-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: I've recaptured my moon crab. My apologies for the mess left on your beach. {A抱歉}As both an apology and a token of gratitude...
info: 获得生态屋-墨尔斯-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: {A拍手}I never imagined the Eco-Tank could be teeming with this much life... This data is invaluable to me, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>. I really appreciate it.
info: 获得生态屋-墨尔斯-复杂对话_主流程文本II

content: Why not stay and continue with your ecological research efforts?
info: 获得生态屋-墨尔斯-复杂对话_主流程文本II
